install.name: Jmaps Display
install.author: Jerry Johnson
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2011 Jerry Johnson. All rights reserved.
install.description: Module to use Jmaps to display a Google map.

param.name: JmapKeepInView
param.label: Float Map down on Scroll
param.option: Allow the map to scroll off the page

param.name: JmapDraggable
param.label: Allow the map to be dragged

param.name: JmapScrollWheel
param.label: Zoom Map by Mouse Wheel
param.option: Do Not Zoom Using Mouse Wheel

param.name: JmapSVScrollWheel
param.label: Zoom Streetview by Mouse Wheel
param.option: Do Not Zoom Using Mouse Wheel

param.name: JmapCBlist
param.label: CB List Number (if Community Builder specified above)

param.name: JmapCBAll
param.label: Show CB Users Listed or All
param.option: All Entries for the CB Userlist
User List Entires Shown on Each Page

param.name: JmapSOBIcat
param.label: SOBI Category (if SOBI Category plug-in or field specified above)

param.name: JmapSOBIcatAll
param.label: Show Categories Listed or All
param.option: Category Entires listed on Each Page

param.name: JmapSOBIcatMarkerColors
param.label: Markers by SOBI2 Category (if SOBI2 plug-in is used)

param.name: JmapCategoryPriority
param.label: Category Priority
param.option: Use category ID to set map marker z-index

param.name: JmapSOBIdetailsBoxTmplSEF
param.label: Is SEF inuse on the site?

param.name: JmapOther
param.label: XML input file name (if User supplied above)

param.name: JmapSOBIoneLiner
param.label: Is SOBI OneLiner in use on the site?

field.name: JmapKeepInView
field.label: Float Map down on Scroll
field.option: Allow the map to scroll off the page

field.name: JmapDraggable
field.label: Allow the map to be dragged

field.name: JmapScrollWheel
field.label: Zoom Map by Mouse Wheel
field.option: Do Not Zoom Using Mouse Wheel

field.name: JmapSVScrollWheel
field.label: Zoom Streetview by Mouse Wheel
field.option: Do Not Zoom Using Mouse Wheel

field.name: JmapCBlist
field.label: CB List Number (if Community Builder specified above)

field.name: JmapCBAll
field.label: Show CB Users Listed or All
field.option: All Entries for the CB Userlist
User List Entires Shown on Each Page

field.name: JmapSOBIcatAll
field.label: Show Categories Listed or All
field.option: Category Entires listed on Each Page

field.name: JmapSOBIcatMarkerColors
field.label: Markers by SOBI Category (if SOBI plug-in or field is used)

field.name: JmapCategoryPriority
field.label: Category Priority
field.option: Use category ID to set map marker z-index

field.name: JmapSOBIdetailsBoxTmplSEF
field.label: Is SEF inuse on the site?

field.name: JmapOther
field.label: XML input file name (if User supplied above)

field.name: JmapSOBIoneLiner
field.label: Is SOBI OneLiner in use on the site?
